document.full_text: the portland trail blazers, led by brandon roy, overcame a 23-point deficit to stun the dallas mavericks 84-82, while late rallies by the san antonio spurs, chicago bulls and denver nuggets fell short.
document.title: portland rally stuns dallas, others leave it too late
lines_and_colors: the portland trail blazers, led by brandon roy, overcame a 23-point deficit to stun the dallas mavericks 84-82, while late rallies by the san antonio spurs, chicago bulls and denver nuggets fell short.
